classes.name: CoinAdjacencyVector
classes.brief: Vector of growable vectors

classes.name: CoinAlloc
classes.brief:
Memory pool allocator for small fixed-size blocks

Optional memory pool that reduces malloc overhead for small allocations.
Configure with COINUTILS_MEMPOOL_MAXPOOLED and COINUTILS_MEMPOOL_ALIGNMENT.

classes.name: CoinBronKerbosch
classes.brief: Bron-Kerbosch Algorithm for maximal clique enumeration

classes.name: CoinBuild
classes.brief:
Efficient row-by-row or column-by-column model construction

CoinBuild accumulates rows or columns for batch addition to a model.
More efficient than adding one row/column at a time to CoinPackedMatrix.

classes.name: CoinCliqueExtender
classes.brief: Clique extender

classes.name: CoinCliqueList
classes.brief: Sequential storage for cliques found in conflict graphs

classes.name: CoinCliqueSet
classes.brief: Set of cliques

classes.name: CoinConflictGraph
classes.brief: Conflict graph for binary variable incompatibilities in MIP

classes.name: CoinCutPool
classes.brief: Class for storing a pool of cuts

classes.name: CoinDenseFactorization
classes.brief:
Dense matrix factorization and CoinOtherFactorization base class

Provides CoinOtherFactorization abstract base class for alternative
factorization methods, plus CoinDenseFactorization for small dense
problems using LAPACK-style LU.

classes.name: CoinDenseVector
classes.brief:
Dense vector template with element-wise arithmetic operations

CoinDenseVector<T> stores all elements in a contiguous array.
Unlike sparse vectors, every position has storage. Supports
arithmetic operators (+, -, *, /) with other dense vectors.

classes.name: CoinDistance
classes.brief:
Platform-independent iterator distance utilities

Provides wrapper functions around std::distance to ensure consistent
behavior across different compilers and platforms. These utilities are
used throughout COIN-OR for iterator-based calculations.

classes.name: CoinDynamicConflictGraph
classes.brief: CoinConflictGraph implementation which supports modifications.

classes.name: CoinError
classes.brief:
Exception class and assertion macros for COIN-OR error handling

Provides CoinError, a rich exception class that captures context about
where and why an error occurred, plus assertion macros that can optionally
throw CoinError instead of calling abort().

classes.name: CoinFactorization
classes.brief:
LU factorization of sparse basis matrix for simplex

Implements LU factorization with hyper-sparse handling for efficient
FTRAN/BTRAN operations. Supports rank-one updates during pivoting.

classes.name: CoinFileIO
classes.brief:
Abstract file I/O with automatic compression detection

Provides CoinFileInput and CoinFileOutput base classes with factory
methods that auto-detect gzip/bzip2 compression. Used by CoinMpsIO
and CoinLpIO for reading/writing problem files.

classes.name: CoinFinite
classes.brief:
Numeric limit constants and floating-point validation functions

Provides platform-independent definitions for numeric limits (COIN_DBL_MAX,
COIN_INT_MAX, etc.) and functions to check for special floating-point values
(infinity, NaN). These are fundamental utilities used throughout COIN-OR
for bounds checking and numerical validation.

classes.name: CoinFloatEqual
classes.brief: Function objects for testing equality of real numbers Two objects are provided; one tests for equality to an absolute tolerance, one to a scaled tolerance. The tests will handle IEEE floating point, but note that infinity == infinity. Mathematicians are rolling in their graves, but this matches the behaviour for the common practice of using DBL_MAX (numeric_limits::max(), or similar large finite number) as infinity.

classes.name: CoinHelperFunctions
classes.brief:
Low-level utility functions for array manipulation, copying, and comparison

Provides optimized template functions for common array operations used throughout
COIN-OR: copying (with Duff's device optimization), filling, zeroing, sorting checks,
iota generation, and element deletion. Also includes random number generation and
file I/O utilities.

Many functions offer ~2x speedup over naive loops via loop unrolling and
Duff's device techniques.

classes.name: CoinIndexedVector
classes.brief:
Sparse vector with dense backing array for O(1) element access

CoinIndexedVector combines sparse index storage with a dense values array,
enabling O(1) random access while tracking which positions are non-zero.
Designed for simplex operations where sparse updates need fast access.
Has optional "packed" mode that behaves more like CoinPackedVector.

classes.name: CoinLpIO
classes.brief:
LP file format reader/writer for linear programming problems

Reads/writes CPLEX LP format with Min/Max objective, constraints,
bounds, and integer/binary variable declarations.

classes.name: CoinMessage
classes.brief:
Standard COIN-OR message definitions (enum and preloaded set)

Defines COIN_Message enum for standard messages (MPS errors, presolve
info, etc.) and CoinMessage class that preloads these into a handler.

classes.name: CoinMessageHandler
classes.brief:
Flexible message handling with severity levels and i18n support

Provides CoinMessageHandler for formatted output with:
- Severity-based filtering (warnings, errors, info)
- Detail/logging levels
- Multi-language support (messages default to US English)
- Output to stdout or FILE pointer

classes.name: CoinModel
classes.brief:
High-level model building with string names and expressions

CoinModel provides a flexible interface for constructing LP/MIP models.
Supports row/column names, string-based expressions, and incremental
building. Convert to CoinPackedMatrix for solver use.

classes.name: CoinModelUseful
classes.brief: Helper classes for CoinModel (Link, LinkedList, Hash)

classes.name: CoinMpsIO
classes.brief:
MPS file format reader/writer for LP and MIP problems

Reads/writes standard MPS format including extensions for quadratic,
conic, and SOS constraints. Supports free format and compression.

classes.name: CoinNodeHeap
classes.brief: Monotone min-heap for Dijkstra's algorithm

classes.name: CoinOddWheelSeparator
classes.brief: Odd-wheel cut separator

classes.name: CoinOslFactorization
classes.brief:
LU factorization derived from IBM OSL (Optimization Subroutine Library)

Port of OSL's factorization code. Provides alternative to CoinFactorization
with different numerical characteristics and update strategies.

classes.name: CoinPackedMatrix
classes.brief:
Sparse matrix stored in compressed row or column format

CoinPackedMatrix represents a sparse matrix using compressed storage.
Can be stored row-major or column-major. Efficient for major-dimension
operations (accessing rows in row-major, columns in column-major).

classes.name: CoinPackedVector
classes.brief:
Sparse vector that owns its index/value storage

CoinPackedVector stores a sparse vector as parallel arrays of indices
and values. Unlike CoinShallowPackedVector, this class owns its storage
and supports modification operations.

classes.name: CoinPackedVectorBase
classes.brief:
Abstract base class for read-only sparse vector access

Provides the read-only interface for sparse vectors stored as parallel
index/value arrays. This is the base class for CoinPackedVector (owning)
and CoinShallowPackedVector (non-owning reference).

classes.name: CoinParam
classes.brief:
Command line parameter parsing with keyword matching

Provides base class for 'keyword value' parameters with support for
integer, double, string, and keyword-set values. Includes partial
keyword matching, range validation, and help text.

classes.name: CoinPragma
classes.brief: Compiler-specific pragma settings (mainly MSVC warnings)

classes.name: CoinPresolveDoubleton
classes.brief: Doubleton row presolve: substitute y from ax+by=c

classes.name: CoinPresolveDual
classes.brief: Fix variables using dual bounds and reduced cost analysis

classes.name: CoinPresolveDupcol
classes.brief: Detect and remove duplicate columns and rows

classes.name: CoinPresolveEmpty
classes.brief:
Drop and reinsert empty rows/columns

Should be last presolve step. Physical removal of empty entities.

classes.name: CoinPresolveFixed
classes.brief: Remove fixed variables and make variables fixed

classes.name: CoinPresolveForcing
classes.brief: Forcing and useless constraint detection

classes.name: CoinPresolveImpliedFree
classes.brief: Detect and process implied free variables

classes.name: CoinPresolveIsolated
classes.brief: Handle isolated constraints (connected only by free variables)

classes.name: CoinPresolveMatrix
classes.brief:
Core presolve data structures and action base class

Defines CoinPrePostsolveMatrix (common base), CoinPresolveMatrix (for
presolve), CoinPostsolveMatrix (for postsolve), and CoinPresolveAction
(base class for all presolve transformations).

classes.name: CoinPresolveMonitor
classes.brief: Monitor rows/columns for debugging presolve transforms

classes.name: CoinPresolvePsdebug
classes.brief:
Debug and consistency checking for presolve

Enable with PRESOLVE_DEBUG and PRESOLVE_CONSISTENCY defines.

classes.name: CoinPresolveSingleton
classes.brief: Singleton row/column presolve transforms

classes.name: CoinPresolveSubst
classes.brief: Variable substitution from equality constraints

classes.name: CoinPresolveTighten
classes.brief: Tighten variable bounds using constraint propagation

classes.name: CoinPresolveTripleton
classes.brief: Tripleton row presolve: three-variable equation substitution

classes.name: CoinPresolveUseless
classes.brief: Remove useless (redundant) constraints

classes.name: CoinPresolveZeros
classes.brief: Drop and reintroduce explicit zero coefficients

classes.name: CoinRational
classes.brief:
Rational number representation with double-to-rational conversion

Provides a simple rational number class that can convert floating-point
values to rational approximations. Useful in optimization for converting
floating-point coefficients to exact rational form when needed.

classes.name: CoinSearchTree
classes.brief:
Search tree data structures for branch-and-bound

Provides tree node management with various comparison strategies
(best-first, depth-first, breadth-first).

classes.name: CoinShallowPackedVector
classes.brief:
Non-owning sparse vector reference (view into external storage)

CoinShallowPackedVector provides read-only access to sparse vector data
stored elsewhere. It maintains only pointers, not copies. Use when you
need a lightweight view into a row/column of a CoinPackedMatrix.

classes.name: CoinSignal
classes.brief: Cross-platform signal handler typedef (CoinSighandler_t)

classes.name: CoinSimpFactorization
classes.brief:
Simple LU factorization for LP basis matrices

Straightforward LU factorization implementation. Less optimized than
CoinFactorization but simpler and useful as reference implementation.

classes.name: CoinSmartPtr
classes.brief: Intrusive reference-counted smart pointer

classes.name: CoinSnapshot
classes.brief:
Lightweight read-only snapshot of problem state at a B&B node

CoinSnapshot captures problem data for cut generators and branching code.
May own or reference external arrays (see owned_ flag). Designed for
passing problem state without copying full solver structures.

classes.name: CoinSort
classes.brief:
Sorting utilities for pairs, triples, and parallel arrays

Provides CoinPair, CoinTriple, and sort functions for sorting
multiple related arrays together (e.g., indices and values).

classes.name: CoinStaticConflictGraph
classes.brief: static CoinConflictGraph implementation with fast queries

classes.name: CoinStructuredModel
classes.brief: Block-structured model composed of CoinModel blocks

classes.name: CoinTime
classes.brief:
Cross-platform timing utilities (CPU and wall clock)

Provides CoinCpuTime() and CoinWallclockTime() that work on
Windows, Mac, and Unix/Linux platforms.

classes.name: CoinUtility
classes.brief:
Factory functions for CoinPair and CoinTriple

Provides convenience functions for creating CoinPair and CoinTriple objects
with automatic template argument deduction, similar to std::make_pair.

classes.name: CoinWarmStart
classes.brief: Abstract interfaces for warm start information in optimization solvers

classes.name: CoinWarmStartBasis
classes.brief:
Simplex basis warm start with variable status (basic/nonbasic)

Stores status of each variable (structural and artificial) using
2 bits per variable. Includes diff capability for branch-and-bound.

classes.name: CoinWarmStartDual
classes.brief:
Warm start using dual variable values only

Stores dual solution vector for warm starting interior point methods
or dual simplex. Includes diff capability for branch-and-bound.

classes.name: CoinWarmStartPrimalDual
classes.brief:
Warm start using both primal and dual variable values

Stores both primal (column) and dual (row) solution vectors.
Useful for interior point methods. Includes diff capability.

classes.name: CoinWarmStartVector
classes.brief: Template warm start storing a single typed vector
